website_summaries.verdict: Mix your pancake batter right in this leak-free dispenser. It has a narrower spout, so it's best for thinner batters without large pieces of candy or fruit.
pros: Mix and dispense your batter in this 4-cup container
Clearly marked measuring increments printed on dispenser
Dishwasher safe, but may last longer if hand-washed
cons: Dispenser hole is 1/2" wide, so it's best with thinner batter or batter without large pieces of fruit or candies

customer_reviews.title: Handle snapped with normal use.
customer_reviews.text: It worked fine for a few uses. Then the clear plastic handle snapped when squeezing the trigger to dispense the batter.
customer_reviews.author: StPhred

customer_reviews.title: The product is less than desirable!
customer_reviews.text: I am a home baker & I ordered TWO of these batter dispensers & they were delivered November 12th. The first one broke in the middle of preparing a cupcake order the first week in Decembet. The second one broke the beginning of Christmas week. The bottom white ring on BOTH of them came off & batter went everywhere. Needless to say, I will not be ordering a replacement for either of them. A disillusioned customer indeed!
customer_reviews.author: Jacque

customer_reviews.title: Great for pancakes, going to try crepes next
customer_reviews.text: Got 2 of these for doing pancakes for our Men's Breakfast at church. They work well. The guys who use them love them and both said they were going to buy one for home. Only drawback is the amount each one holds, I wish it was bigger, but then I knew it was a little small, that is why I bought 2. If they wear out I will most likely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Cent Fl User

customer_reviews.title: Not for heavy use...
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered several of these, a couple for me and a couple for church, they work well for light use but won’t hold up for heavy use. Wish the handle part could be made out of something more durable than plastic. The last one I received was wrapped terribly, the outer box was damaged and the product box was also damaged. The plastic handle was broken too. Would have returned but I needed it so I was able to repair with superglue. Doesn’t look very pretty but it works, for now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, LOVE!!
customer_reviews.text: No more messy line of pancake mix forming down the bowl onto the counter, this thing is AWESOME!! I mix my batter in a separate bowl and then pour it into the dispenser but once in the dispenser you can stir if needed. Making even, fluffy pancakes is easy now with this and has turned breakfast time into a blast for me (the cook) and has made cleanup a lot quicker too.
customer_reviews.author: JSilv

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of crap... barely last 4 months & I probably only used it 12 times before the handle broke... past the time window to return it so it’s a total loss & waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: It will not dispense thick batter efficiently. You need to thin it out a bit more than I like to use for fluffy pancakes. No complaints though. Easy to use, no bottom leaks, easy to clean. The only drawback is the trigger is not easy for people with big hands.
customer_reviews.author: Island Rob

customer_reviews.title: MIX & DISPENSE
customer_reviews.text: 4 CUP CAPACITY, EASILY OPERATED, ATTRACTIVE, LIGHT WEIGHT DISPENSER, WITH CLEAR VISIBLE MEASUREMENTS. SQUEEZE CHOICE AMOUNT OF MIX ONTO A BUTTERY, HOT COOKING SURFACE & WATCH WITHIN SECONDS DELICIOUS MAGIC APPEAR. PANCAKE/WAFFLE LOVERS WILL ENJOY MIXING BATTER & DISPENSING FROM THE SAME CONTAINER. WILL ALSO DISPENSE MUFFIN & CUP CAKE MIXES FOR BAKING. A NO FUSS, NO MESS ITEM THAT PROMOTES BAKING CREATIVITY.
customer_reviews.author: Lindalou

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Work Well for all Batters
customer_reviews.text: I saw someone use this at a neighborhood breakfast and it worked like a charm, so I got it. Turns out your batter has to be the right consistency or it doesn’t do the job. I make crepes and homemade wheat pancakes. The crepe batter is too thin and kind a sprays in different directions when you dispense. The pancake batter I make is too thick and doesn’t dispense well at all. Bottom line, I think it works well for thin pancake batter, but not much else.
customer_reviews.author: Summer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for a busy mama!
customer_reviews.text: I just add the flour mixture, milk, eggs (and whatever else) right in the container and mix with a wisk! It eliminates all kinds of dishes!!!!! I love, love, LOVE this thing!!!
customer_reviews.author: AJK

customer_reviews.title: makes pancakes easier
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It takes the work out of making pancakes. Lot easier clean up and less messy. I get done quicker so I can enjoy the pancakes.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Mine doesn't leak, the hole is small enough though that chocolate chunk and chip cookies and brownies clog up, my riccotta pancakes are really slow going, and blueberry pancakes are a no-go. But I haven't found one with a larger opening so this is what I'll use til I can find one. A lot less mess and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: J. BushTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't dispense the thicker stuff very well, handle came apart, will probably break all together before long. Food gets trapped in between the rubber gasket and causes it to jam without meticulous cleaning. Overall doesn't seem very durable as the plastic is very thin and I'm pretty sure it's not dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: AJF

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I make perfect pancakes every time! This little gadget is a godsend. It is easy to clean and hold. It fills cupcakes easily and quickly. After reading the reviews, I am hesitant to place it in the dishwasher so I hand wash it and handle it delicately. So far I’ve had it for 3 months and I love it! 💕
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A PIECE OF JUNK!  BROKE IN LESS THAN 30 seconds!!!
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk! It broke while filling the very first cupcake! The white round piece of plastic on the bottom snapped off and into the batter. I had to throw away the batter because I couldn’t tell if it left tiny plastic pieces of shrapnel. DO NOT PURCHASE! What a complete waste of time and money!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Skiff

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the value.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a good little gadget for my kitchen. I bake A LOT and this has made dispensing cupcake batter so much easier. I mainly bought it for dispensing pancake batter which it has been great for that as well. Yes, it leaks a little but I have found that most of these do, I just let it drip and then set it on top of a napkin. I have been using it for a couple months and it hasn't broke so that's a plus!
customer_reviews.author: kmc

customer_reviews.title: No mess!!
customer_reviews.text: It does dispense but the way the base is situated, you can’t see how much is coming out. Trying to fill cupcakes is a bit if a hassle. Cleaning is not the quickest. I’ll try it with pancakes and see if I change my mind on this product. I must say that it’s less ness than using a ladle.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Melnyk

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: I just used it for the first time today and I think it's just okay. It's nothing mind blowing by any stretch of the imagination. It's tough to get the batter out when you have very little in there, I used a butter knife to kinda get it moving, it helped a bit. It'll get the job done for sure though.
customer_reviews.author: Richard L.

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect batter dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I broke the last batter dispenser I had that I bought from Aldi’s and since their products only come once a year, I needed a quick replacement and this was the perfect contender. It’s almost as perfect as the one I had from Aldis. It’s super easy to clean and use, I always use it for crepes and it makes making them soooooo much more easier. I love this thing so much!! Just squeeze and it pours.
customer_reviews.author: Nyira

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend mixing in the dispenser as I found the flour ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom really likes this, even more than I do. Makes pancake night/pancake Sunday breakfast a breeze. I do not recommend mixing in the dispenser as I found the flour did not mix well near the dispenser opening, first pancakes came out a little flour-y but okay. I mix in a bowl and then put batter in the dispenser (its one more dish to wash but in my house that's no big deal), I then use the dispenser for perfect pancakes. Have yet to use this for muffins/cupcakes but I can imagine that would work out very nicely too!
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I got a similar but different brand item for Christmas that I loved but it quickly broke at the seam in the handle. I can already tell that this is made nicer than my other was. The handle does bend when squeezing to dispense. Only used it once for far but I am impressed so far!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Marie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and has held up for quite a while
customer_reviews.text: When trying to decide which brand of these dispensers to buy many said they don't last long. I've had this one a couple years now and it still works great. I usually use it for cup cakes, but good for pancakes too. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is the Perfect breakfast mate. Easily dispense batter for pancakes, waffles or cupcake batter. Drip-free, easy clean up..love this device. Tip: from another user place a small amount of liquid inside before pancake mix makes mixing much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy R.

customer_reviews.title: Super cool !
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient, very sturdy and there is no more fussing whose pancake is larger. Wish I would have purchased much sooner. It also made a Christmas gift for my stepfather. He loved it too!
customer_reviews.author: Renee' P Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I make pancakes on a daily basis and man this utensil that I bought makes it so easy to make. I can't imagine making pancakes without it. It's super easy to clean afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Alma

customer_reviews.title: You need this batter to work
customer_reviews.text: I make a thick batter when I make waffles and pancakes so I have to thin it down to work for this and then the pancakes don't taste as good. This isn't for me. Not worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: KLJ

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Great for pancakes! I use this for making pancakes mostly. I give a quick squeeze and make tons of mini pancakes for my 2 year old! I've also filled cupcakes with it. No leaks even when holding water! The hole is definitely plenty big enough for chocolate chips or blueberries. The batter should be kinda thin, remember it needs to pour through a hole about 3/4" thicker batter kinda bloobs out slowly but not as useful for thick batter I found out.
customer_reviews.author: AllianceMommy

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: Dispensed the batter quite easily. Grip release also works well so can control how much you can dispense easily. Cleaning isn't too much of a problem, just have to remember to clean the spout side so I hand wash it do it better.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: I know this got good reviews and I decided to go for it. I don't like the quality of it, materialize, function feels cheaply designed. Sent it back for an oh'ex'oh
customer_reviews.author: ButtaflyPoet

customer_reviews.title: So easy
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. First one lasted 5 years. I use this to fill cupcakes, individual cheesecakes as well as pancakes. Perfect, no mess and so quick. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl S

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately had one and the first time we used it the handle broke off. Got a replacement and had the same thing happen again. Great idea just too cheaply made!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Hauber

customer_reviews.title: Gamechanger
customer_reviews.text: The husband likes his pancakes on Sunday mornings. This is quite simply a game changer. It makes dispensing the batter so simple. It minimizes wasted batter and spills that happen spooning it out on the griddle. I love this little guy!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for pouring batter for baked doughnuts. I have used it four times, and it has made making doughnuts so much easier. It cleans easily!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremysnana

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but doesn’t really work
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this. Unfortunately I feel like if the batter is even remotely thick it won’t come out so I don’t really have much I can actually use it for, most of the pancakes we make are too thick even. The bottom where the batter comes out is a bit hard to clean, batter gets into the crevices and I have to use a toothpick to scrape it out. Needs some work
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like this dispenser. However, it popped apart twice when I pulled on the handle to dispense batter. Not sure it will last long.
customer_reviews.author: CKell

customer_reviews.title: Great for thinner batter, not so much for thicker
customer_reviews.text: I was on the hunt for a pitcher that I could use to fill cupcake cups without making a huge mess. I didn't consider that the info on the product kept mentioning pancake batter. This is obviously made for pancakes and crepe batters, not as much for cupcake. It did work, but it took a long time and was no cleaner than the large spoon method I'd been using before.
customer_reviews.author: C. Maureen Hill

customer_reviews.title: Eh...
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. Not worth the hassel. Hard to clean and messier to use than expected. Dispensing out of a generic water bottle is better.
customer_reviews.author: Santina

customer_reviews.title: A fun product to use
customer_reviews.text: Well designed product that offers a greater degree of precision in pouring pancake batter. Easy to clean if you are careful. The grandkids love making pancakes with me using this item. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Russell A. Duncan

customer_reviews.title: By it you will like it
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to make pancakes easy to place with less mess on the griddle. This little shooter filled the bill. It also makes it easy to fill cup cake pans
customer_reviews.author: Flying Jackolade

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient ~ Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, easy to use, measures out well with side measurements. When I prepare pancake mix overnight and leave it in the frigerator, it gets very thick so I let it come to room temperature or add a bit of hot water and stir it inside to loosen it up. Then it comes out of the bottom in an even flow. The white lid allows protection from odors. The only really bad thing is the clean up, but that goes without saying.
customer_reviews.author: Kokonana

customer_reviews.title: LOVED this, until it fell and shattered
customer_reviews.text: Loved the ease of this dispenser, and the fact that it actually sealed and didn't drip all over the place. Until I washed it by hand, put it on the drain and it fell a whopping 3 feet, shattered into a million pieces, even the dispensing mechanism fell apart. Wish it was made of a more durable material. That being said, I love it so much I am purchasing a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Z.

customer_reviews.title: Should be in every baker's tool box!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I have a house full of boys and pancakes are a favorite, but I never made them because it was messy and took forever. This makes it so much faster. Especially when you are churning out 30+ pancakes at a time. I've also used it with cake batter, and for funnel cakes. I didn't have luck using it with my banana muffin recipe but it is really thick. This dispenser cleans up great. And I've had it for a while now with nothing but good things to say about it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca A Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Loved having it but it broke after 2 uses. The bottom piece is barely secure and the side plastic piece broke.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2girls

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: The batter did not disperse very well I had to open then shake in order for the watery batter to flow out and washing the item was hard to do.
customer_reviews.author: breezy

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect sized pancakes over and over.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my propane griddle for camping. It works great. It's easy to clean and doesn't leak like some reviews stated. You have to practice a little to get the right batter consistency. I get about 8 perfect sized pancakes with each fill up.
customer_reviews.author: Ken M

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I could use it for ,without clogging, was pancake mix ...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this dispenser ! We make a LOT of pancakes in our house and this has made that so much easier! Would definitely buy as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: dukegirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I've read the other reviews and even though there were a few not so good reviews on it, I went with this purchase anyway, and I am so glad that I did! I love how this works and it cleans up easily too. I hIghly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Gerri Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pancakes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I hate making a mess to spoon batter into the pan while making pancakes because it drips everywhere and this made it so easy and clean!! I am so glad I gave it a try.
customer_reviews.author: A. Muns

customer_reviews.title: One of my more brilliant inventions if I do say so myself.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dispense laundry detergent into the top of large front loading laundromat washers since I am too short to see up there and it's too hard to hold a tiny measuring cup in one hand and a giant, heavy jug of detergent in the other.
customer_reviews.author: J. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: No more messes
customer_reviews.text: Great for dispensing batter and no mess to clean. I mix my batter and just release the perfect amount.
customer_reviews.author: Jacinda

customer_reviews.title: Batter dispenser
customer_reviews.text: The opening is too small for my thick pancake batter to fit though, or muffin batter. Perhaps it works better with a thinner cake batter.
customer_reviews.author: Jo.C

customer_reviews.title: Fast Batter Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This Batter dispenser I had to fix the handle after using a few times. A piece came out of place. It works really good with thinner batters. I had a cup cake batter that was very thick and I ended up scooping back out. This works wonderful for pancake batter, waffles, thinner cupcake batters, ect. My 9 year old daughter loves making cupcakes with this because it is so easy. Plus it isn't as messing as dragging a spoon or bowl across all the counters.
customer_reviews.author: shellytool

customer_reviews.title: No mess batter dispenser
customer_reviews.text: All in all works well. Might be a little hard to see exactly where the batter will land if your trying to do something like small cupcakes. But easy to work with
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Serves Its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Been hand washing it with no issues. No mess, no fuss.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G

customer_reviews.title: Tossed it in a week
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for a week, then it broke. The bottom part that opened the valve broke off the handle so I threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: mcontre1

customer_reviews.title: If you make pancakes weekly this is a smart investment
customer_reviews.text: If you haven’t made pancakes with one of these then you haven’t made pancakes the fun and easy way. It’s like you’re kitchen becomes a diner cranking out pancakes as fast as the kids can eat them. But honestly, clean it right away. Tiny parts stuck with dried pancake won’t be fun. That’s not it’s fault, that’s your problem for procastinating.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Must Have for Cupcakes
customer_reviews.text: It is fun and so convenient when working with any thin batter. May not hold up after several years of use but I would definitely replace it with another.
customer_reviews.author: Larry O. West

customer_reviews.title: Wish I has this years ago
customer_reviews.text: Almost as good as the wheel. Everybody loves my cupcakes, so I bake a lot. It was always a pain to fill the liners and not make a mess, so I don't bake as often as requested. I have a stainless steel pancake batter dispenser that just doesn't work for cupcakes. This makes filling the liners for mini cupcakes as well as the standards size cupcakes so much quicker, easier and cleaner. It is to small to mix the batter in but definitely still worth using. Now I bake cupcakes 4 to 5 times a week.
customer_reviews.author: Rie

customer_reviews.title: Easy pancakes!
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done! We use it for pancakes and they always come out pretty!
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo Guerrero

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.
customer_reviews.text: After only a few uses over the course of a month the handle broke at the top. It still dispense, but to get the batter to come out you need to shake it slightly, and that does NOT feel safe. A little extra reinforcement near the top would make this about 100 times better.
customer_reviews.author: Nolan Townes

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect dispenser for pancakes or waffles without making a mess!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is great especially for kids to help In the kitchen. All in on so no other dishes to clean. I bought this as a gift for my dad to use with the grandchildren. They all love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Zarbock

customer_reviews.title: Nice for large quantities of batter.... hassle for smaller amounts.
customer_reviews.text: This works well for large quantities of things. I like to use it when I make a lot of cupcakes or pancakes. The handle does tend to stick a bit. When you get down to a little bit of batter left it comes out so slow and seems to take forever! I never consider getting this out and dirtying it for small quantities, it just isn't worth the hassle and clean up!
customer_reviews.author: J & B

customer_reviews.title: DOES THE JOB BUT LEAKS
customer_reviews.text: Used it to make Christmas Day breakfast. This dispenser is east to use, however, it will leak. I had some pancake batter left over. I put a small pie e of foil underneath and stored in the fridge to prevent batter leakage.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Even though it’s made out of plastic it’s a thicker plastic. The trigger works very well.
customer_reviews.author: IM

customer_reviews.title: Pancake must have!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a pancake dispenser is a game changer! Use to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: crystal sewell

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure why I didn’t buy one of these sooner. My kids love it snd soo much easier to clean up when done.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great invention for pancakes and cupcakes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this batter dispenser to use to make pancakes and cupcakes. Plus, you can store leftover batter in it for a short time. Great invention!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Weber

customer_reviews.title: Great for cupcakes!
customer_reviews.text: Was at my daughters house making cupcakes and she pulled this out of the cabinet for me to use. I loved it so much I had to buy one for myself. No mess on cupcake pan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tool. but be careful top comes off
customer_reviews.text: This thing worked perfect for a cupcake party I was having. I was able to fill the cupcake liners very quickly and neatly. My only concern is that the top does not lock on. My daughter placed it upside dwn on thewhite top, when she lifted it up all of the batter spilled all over the counter! You have to keep it face down otherwise there will be a huge mess to clean up. Aside from that it's very easy, fool proof& works well
customer_reviews.author: Moe1022

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I attempted to dispense batter for my cupcakes using a Ziploc bag that I cut a hole into, there was batter EVERYWHERE! While searching another product I came across this batter dispenser. I was skeptical about it, because but I have to admit, it kept everything as clean as can be and made my cupcake making super easy, on top of the fact that you can determine how much batter you dispense in each compartment. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing bad to say about this. My kids and I love it!! Easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Kaycee123

customer_reviews.title: Great Grease separater
customer_reviews.text: I use this to separate grease and it works amazing. If you smoke anything this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: sgmc2s

customer_reviews.title: Great for pancake batter, not for waffle batter
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit for making pancakes but does not work with thicker batter like waffle batter.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Batter Up!
customer_reviews.text: This thing dispenses batter just as described. Almost as easy as pouring it out of a pitcher, but not quite.
customer_reviews.author: David E. Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Good starter dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I only gave 4 stars because I wish it held more batter. It’s a good starter dispenser. Seems durable and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Prime user

customer_reviews.title: Making Pancakes? Buy this right now!
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed one of these from a friend and it was so amazing, I bought my own. Making pancakes is so simple with this contraption. It makes for less mess and greater precision. What's not to like?
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine. Mine came with a chunk missing from the lid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for buttermilk pancakes
customer_reviews.text: made for runny pancakes not buttermilk/thicker pancakes. dispenses too slow.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: would be a 5 star, but the drip holds batter in the O-ring and makes a bit of a mess. other than that little flaw, it does what it says and makes it easy for cooking in my small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Love it and use all the time!
customer_reviews.text: When my old batter dispenser broke I decided to try this brand out and I couldn't be happier! This works great and makes cupcake baking so much easier!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Reissig

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Not very good for mixing the product and if the product is too thin it will seep out
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Chona

customer_reviews.title: Pancakes!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use! The only way I dispense pancake batter now. No mess!!
customer_reviews.author: Naj

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Plastic
customer_reviews.text: I was delivered broken. Never got a chance to use it. Can't return it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sato

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: The liquid spills out of the dispenser had to keep a plate under it while not in use because batter kept coming out. And if you are not extra gentle or slow when pressing on the handle the batter will just pour out!
customer_reviews.author: Tamam

customer_reviews.title: It would be better if somehow it would pre-measure each pour
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little practice to pour out pancakes of the right size, but overall a decent product. It would be better if somehow it would pre-measure each pour.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Not pro batter dispenser don’t bother
customer_reviews.text: I thought I could dispense batter but it stuck and was extremely messy and annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have found this sooner.
customer_reviews.text: I make a large batch of pancakes every weekend for the full work week since that saves quite a bit of time. This dispenser cuts down on spills and it gives me the control to make each pancake roughly the same size. It is easy to clean up, though I recommend cleaning it right after you use it so that the batter does not dry in the opening mechanism.
customer_reviews.author: Ross C.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and she absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Just

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works great and easy to use If you make lots of pancakes then this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: MikeJ

customer_reviews.title: 9yr old Grand daughter loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 9 yr old grand daughter who loves to bake cupcakes. She lives it!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Co

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver!
customer_reviews.text: I am baking 20 dozen cupcakes for a wedding and I needed something that would speed up the process of putting the batter into the cupcake pan. It really saved a tremendous amount of time, and was easy to use. I was able to get all of the cupcakes baked in a reasonable amount of time.
customer_reviews.author: Steven P Markle

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works great but it does leak a little. But would buy again and for gifts for people.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Efficient to use!
customer_reviews.text: Works like a champ. I use it to make equal sized pancakes. Very neat and tidy to use. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: CRN

customer_reviews.title: Better than the reviews
customer_reviews.text: No drips, easy to use, holds just the right amount
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It works you just have to make sure to make the batter a little more runny because a thick batter won’t work well.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Just bad.  Don’t waste your dollars.
customer_reviews.text: This thing run worse than then a lactose intolerant person who downed a pint of ice cream. The handle broke within 5 mins. Mini chocolate chips can’t ever. Pass through the hole without help. Hate it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to dispense pancake batter but it wasn't user friendly so I used it to fill condiment cups in my restaurant. It worked fine for a while but a part began popping off resulting in several huge spills so I had to toss it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great pancakes, less mess!
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves making pancakes with these and I must admit it really reduces the mess and makes perfect pancakes!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

product_meta.title: Norpro Batter Dispenser
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Dispenser| Size:4 cupMeasures: 7.25" x 6.5" x 6.5” / 18.5cm x 16.5cm x 16.5cm
Capacity: 4C/1L
Mix and dispense your batter with one tool! No wasted batter and less mess. Easily and accurately dispense cupcake, pancake, crepe, waffle and most other batters and sauces. Pull soft grip handle to dispense batter, release handle to stop the batter flow. Allows you to easily control the amount of batter you want to dispense. Easy to read measurements on the side in ounces, cups and milliliters. Easy to clean and store.

 Norpro was founded in 1973 with a vision to design, manufacture, and supply the highest caliber kitchenware. Norpro’s offering of innovative, high quality product for cooking, preparing and serving food are produced with superior materials and craftsmanship.
feature_bullets: Measures: 7.25" x 6.5" x 6.5” / 18.5cm x 16.5cm x 16.5cm. Capacity: 4C/1L

Easily and accurately dispense cupcake, pancake, crepe, waffle and most other batters and sauces.

Easy to read measurements on the side in ounces, cups and milliliters.
